title: Co-precipitation synthesis of highly pure and Mg-doped CdO nanoparticles: from rod to sphere shapes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22690-22700
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03525A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
S. Cathrin Lims, M. Jose, Sivakumar Aswathappa, S. Sahaya Jude Dhas, Raju Suresh Kumar, Phuong V. Pham
This study reports a facile approach for examining surface morphology transitions in semiconductor nanoparticles (NPs), with a focus on pristine and magnesium-doped cadmium oxide NPs.
